content: **knitted shawl in drops air piece is knitted sideways in stocking stitch with i-cord ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern ai-510 yarn group c or a + a ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** height measured in the middle = approx 48 cm width measured along the top side from side to side = approx 176 cm **yarn** drops air from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 150 g colour 16 blue **needles** drops circular needle size 5 mm length 60 cm **knitting gauge** 17 stitches in width and 22 row vertically in stocking stitch on needle size 5 mm = 10 x 10 cm note remember that needle size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger needles if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller needles
